author: M.P. Praveen
title: Now, police turn to yoga to make people stay at home
description: 10-minute video on different asanas that will help strengthen respiratory system
content:
Having effectively used their popular social media wing to raise awareness about COVID-19 through humorous memes and viral videos, the Kerala Police are now set to dabble in yoga to bolster their stay at home campaign.
The initiative, tagged Yoga against Cor… [+1724 chars]
